features: SLEEK DESIGN: 27 inch monitor with Full HD, an HDMI input, 75hz refresh rate, and a resolution of 1920x1080, this desktop monitor is perfect for both home and office use. Aspect ratio: 16:9. Viewing Angle: 178.0 degrees.
VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY: Boost productivity as a secondary PC monitor at work or at home office with HDMI and VGA inputs. Great as a second monitor for laptop or desktop computers
SMALL-FOOTPRINT: Built-in power supply unit and cable holder reduce clutter freeing workspace and to regain your desk real estate

OPTIMAL COMFORT: Easy tilt 75Hz monitor with 4ms response time and an anti-glare coating time delivers smooth, blur-free images ideal for a variety of lighting conditions, Vertical Viewing Angle - 178
DELL SERVICES: 1 Year Advanced Exchange Service. If your warranty issue cant be resolved remotely, Dell will send a replacement monitor the next business day
body.description: Dell 27 inch monitor SE2722HX is engineered with Full HD, an HDMI input, 75hz refresh rate, and a resolution of 1920x1080, this desktop monitor is perfect for both home and office use. Also great as a second monitor for laptop or desktop computers. This PC monitor features a three-sided slim bezel and a compact footprint that frees up valuable desktop workspace. A built-in power supply unit and cable holder help to further reduce clutter. Optimize eye comfort the easy tilt 75Hz monitor with 4ms response time and an anti-glare coating time delivers smooth, blur-free images ideal for a variety of lighting conditions to get the right viewing angle. For tear-free visuals during leisure gameplay, this computer monitor comes with AMD FreeSync™ technology. To reduce our manufacturing impact on the environment, this monitor is shipped Styrofoam-free and the packaging is made of at least 75% recycled cardboard.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thoughtfully designed More screen space: Slim bezels mean fewer distractions and an improved viewable screen-to-body ratio. Sturdy and compact: Free up your workspace and regain your desk real estate with this small-footprint monitor. A built-in power supply unit and cable holder help to further reduce clutter. Adjustable to your liking: Easily tilt the monitor to get just the right viewing angle or hook it up with a compatible VESA mount.

Easy on the eyes Increase viewing comfort: Minimize harmful blue light emissions to help reduce eye fatigue with Dell’s TÜV -certified ComfortView feature. Ease eye fatigue: Optimize eye comfort and minimize distractions thanks to a flicker-free, anti-glare screen. Simplify your screen: Stay organized and easily manage multiple applications and windows on a single screen using Dell EasyArrange.
Smooth and lively visuals For tear-free visuals during leisure gameplay, this monitor features AMD FreeSync technology, fast response time and 75Hz refresh rate.

Better for the environment Eco-conscious packaging: To reduce our manufacturing impact on the environment, this monitor is shipped Styrofoam-free and the packaging is made of at least 75% recycled cardboard. Energy conservation: Save energy when your monitor is not in use with PowerNap, a feature that dims or puts your monitor to sleep when it’s not in use. Advancing sustainability: Dell Technologies is committed to reducing environmental impact throughout the product lifecycle.
Ports and Slots 1. Power connector | 2. HDMI | 3. VGA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture and response time from this monitor
reviews.reviewText: I use this as an extension for my smaller laptop and it works great! The colors are bright and vivid and the picture is very clear. It was super easy to set up and only needs an HDMI for my purposes. It is a good size and incorporates into my home office well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, big screen, working as two screens for me!
reviews.reviewText: I researched which size would be best for having a split screen, as I needed way more screen than my work laptop was affording, and this did the trick! I now have my laptop screen to the right to monitor emails, and have the new large screen on my left, connected by HDMI, split in two screens with a browser on each side for working within my programs. It is easy to close my laptop to turn the screen black, and opening my laptop turns it back on. I did adjust the brightness to maximum, but it would be fine normal, too. This was the right price point, on the lower end for the size, and had decent reviews. It was packaged very well and meticulously. You might want help initially to unpack it since you have to slide the base on and the screen is heavy, just in case. The base is ok, kind of large, but it's supporting a large heavy screen. I usually just stick my keyboard on top when I need more space and am not using it. Glad I ended up getting this one after my research. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is bright, colorful, with high resolution (many resolution options). The refresh rate is lower at the highest resolution but it is super responsive and doesn't strain my middle-aged eyes at all. I use the monitor all day for work. Not used for gaming but it seems like it would do fine, videos are great. I have it connected to a Macbook Pro. When connected through a dongle adapter there was a lag, but connected directly to the computer the response is immediate, the delay was in the dongle and not the monitor itself. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great monitor at the right price
reviews.reviewText: I'm an art director and a graphic designer. I just upgraded to a 16" M3 Max MacBook Pro and wanted to get my desk set up with a dual monitor scheme using the laptop as the smaller, secondary screen and a larger 4K monitor as my main workspace.Though I'm an Apple guy and don't really like most of Dell's offerings, their monitors are great, well reviewed and of high quality. This one is 32" and 4K.I initially had some issues getting the monitor and the laptop to recognize each other but when I unplugged the 8K HDMI 2.1 cable and re-plugged it into the Dell Monitor, everything worked perfectly.A note to Mac Users/Designers. I did a bunch of messing around with the settings on both the Dell monitor and within System Preferences>Displays on the macOS (Sonoma) and found the settings in the second photo to work the best, both for color accuracy and consistency between the Dell screen and the MacBook Pro screen to the left of it in the first photo. Definitely select "Apple RGB" in the color profile for the Dell Monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good!
reviews.reviewText: I finally have two monitors set up at home like I do at work - mostly to make it easier to work from home and do some design stuff. I had to replace one of my monitors because the picture quality was significantly different from the other, newer monitor. And, it was frankly too small. It was difficult to read anything on the monitor when I was remoting in to my work computer.So far, I'm happy with this monitor. It does what it is supposed to do and the image quality is much more comparable to the other, newer monitor I have.So far, so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my wife's desk set-up to fit onto a new monitor desk mount. Works great, and was a great replacement for her last monitor. Easy to install onto an arm desk mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't forget Dell Display Manager
reviews.reviewText: This is big screen that is great - easy to install, good picture quality. But what really was magnificent is ability to change sources with a keyboard shortcut using Dell Display Manager software.I use my monitor for both work and home, so when I need to have my work laptop project to a big screen, I press ALT+4 and now I have 2 screen for work, when it's time for my personal desktop - ALT+1.Software is missing a shortcut for PIP/PBP, it would be nice to have, but I can live with what I have. For my previous wide-screen monitor, I had to fumble with monitor buttons - not anymore!The software didn't work with a docking station though, needs a straight computer - HDMI/DP cable.Also, I don't think the Dell Display Manager hotkeys don't work unless logged in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good size clean, screen, easy to use proper for the office please
This works like a charm and provides beautiful output. I just ordered a second.

Como muchos saben, la marca Dell es garantía indiscutible de calidad, y no es la excepción con este monitor de 27 pulgadas. Llego a tiempo, en excelentes condiciones, en su caja original, dentro de un embalaje robusto y fuerte. El paquete incluyen cable VGA y HDMI, es un producto altamente recomendable, muy fino con un rendimiento y características las cuales superó con todas las expectativas que se tenían al respecto!! Se recomienda ampliamente, No tengan duda en adquirirlo!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice monitor but issue with sound
reviews.reviewText: I use headphones plugged into jack on rear of monitor - all I can hear is static, have tried getting in touch with Dell as there’s no contact details on Amazon for seller. Monitor is nice, not too heavy and good res. Just don’t buy if you intend to connect to headphones or speakers via jack

reviews.reviewTitle: Great picture quality. Large screen. DisplayPort works great.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice monitor and as expected, it is large. It was the size of the TV I was using previously for a second monitor off to the side but this one really is big and if you are up close to it, may not be the right size for you. If you have some distance, you should be good to go.My initial unit came with issues and would turn off and on. Going on sites that used 4K like Netflix would cause it to turn off until I switched it off and then the picture would come back. I had to do this each time...until it stopped working altogether, all within a span of a week. Rather than returning it, I wanted to get a replacement since I was able to get it at as a Black Friday discount and didn't want a refund and have to repurchase it, so I went through Dell who had great support and quickly sent me a new one and a return label for the old one to be sent back. Now I have no issues at all.Really great quality video. Great if you are into watching 4K videos or just for gaming. Each person that stopped by over the holidays wanted to check out the 4k quality and were amazed with it. I had a friend who decided to buy it based on what he saw.It is a great monitor. I am using it with DisplayPort and it is perfect.Dell monitors are still some of the best and longest lasting I have used and my last one was a 24" LED that is about 10+ years old and still going without issues. I just wanted something I could use for workouts, watching tv, gaming, school, etc on.I recommend it.
Great value at the time. The monitor is nice and works well so far!
